description: JVM cannot find specified class at runtime. Common with reflection, dynamic loading, or ProGuard issues.
commonCauses: Typo in fully qualified class name
Multidex issues on old Android versions
solutions: Add ProGuard keep rules for reflected classes
Use ::class.java instead of Class.forName() where possible
Verify class name spelling and package
Use @Keep annotation on classes used via reflection
prevention: Minimize use of reflection when possible
Add proper ProGuard rules for all reflected classes
Test with minifyEnabled true before release
Use KClass references instead of string names
